name: TriviaChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open trivia challenge”
”Alexa, start trivia challenge”
”Alexa, launch trivia challenge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trivia challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Trivia Challenge" is an Alexa skill game designed to test your general knowledge with trivia questions.
Users are asked general questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no." Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
